actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish as part of the Outdoor Recreation Programs a program to permit certain residents to cultivate gardens on dormant Federal lands.

summary.text: Establishes as part of the outdoor recreation programs a program to permit citizens or permanent residents of the United States to cultivate gardens no larger than 1000 square feet on dormant Federal lands.

titles.title: A bill to establish as part of the Outdoor Recreation Programs a program to permit certain residents to cultivate gardens on dormant Federal lands.
